data.title: 1952 Grand Prix of The Netherlands
data.text:
III Grote Prijs van Nederland

17 August 1952 - Zandvoort: 377.770 km (4.193 km x 90 laps)

1 2 Alberto Ascari Ferrari 500 '5' 2:53:28.5, 130.577 km/h 2 4 Giuseppe Farina Ferrari 500 '4' 2:54:08.6 3 6 Luigi Villoresi Ferrari 500 '6' 2:55:02.9 4 32 Mike Hawthorn Cooper-Bristol T20 'CB-4-52' 88 laps 5 10 Robert Manzon Gordini 16 '16-0031' 87 laps 6 12 Maurice Trintignant Gordini 16 '16-0033' 87 laps 7 28 Duncan Hamilton HWM-Alta '2-52' 85 laps 8 26 Lance Macklin HWM-Alta '1-52' 84 laps 9 16 Francisco Landi/Jan Flinterman Maserati A6GCM '2032' 83 laps NC 34 Ken Wharton Frazer Nash 421 '421/200/172' 76 laps/Rear axle NC 36 Stirling Moss ERA G-Type 'R1G' 73 laps/Engine NC 30 Dries van der Lof HWM-Alta '3-52' 70 laps Fastest Lap: Alberto Ascari, Ferrari, 1:49.8 (136.912 km/h) on lap ?
